title: The Holistic Guide To Cold-Calling : A Step-By-Step Guide To Help You Create New Business Opportunities
description: Get you and your business phone-ready. Learn how to define yourself, WHAT to say, HOW to say it WHO to say it to. Make cold-calling the enjoyable experience it can be rather than the chore most people think it is. Take the fear out of picking up the phone, get chatting, and start creating a stream of new business opportunities.Ideal book for anyone wanting to build their business or career using the phone as part of their strategy. An easy to follow, step-by-step guide to help you define your company, idea, product, whatever it is you do into a phone ready script.
author: Simone Laraway
